text.fr: je ne trouve vraiment rien à redire , lorsque j ' ai besoin de me trouver avec des amis ou des collègues pour nous restaurer , dans un coin qui reuni à la fois : un grand professionnalisme du personnel , propreté , le menu tant qualitatif que varié , eh bien je ne cherche pas longtemps , le safoutier est le coin tout indiqué
text.en: The Moulin de France is great for bread and pastries. the pastries suck. As for the restaurant, it's not bad, nothing extravagant, ok for a quick lunch. but the problem is that the service is super slow. . .

text.fr: un personnel toujours très sympa et aux petits soins et une cuisine raffinée ( les gambas . . . ! ! ! ) merci à tous frédéric bard
text.en: very good service, welcoming staff, slow service, very good salads, friendly setting makes you want to come back

text.fr: le personnel y est chaleureux et prévenant ( j ' ai même pu garder le stylo de l ' une des filles de salle ) ; la nourriture variée , délicate et goûteuse . . . des prix certes assez élevés . mais pour ce standing et cette ambiance très agréable , j ' aime tout simplement ce restaurant
text.en: off-the-scale pastry flavors. I like to go there when I want to treat myself. first of all the setting, it is clean and welcoming. the staff are polite and informative. the offerings behind the window, quite simply a delight. all this reflects a well-organized and serious team which puts itself at the service of the customer to please and satisfy them.

text.fr: le service est bien . la nourriture est bien et il y en a pour tous les goûts , mais les prix sont exorbitant et dépasse de beaucoup ce qu ' on pourrait payer dans un hilton en amérique du nord .
text.en: very good bakery and ice cream parlor, but no pastry shop. the tea room allows you to consume some on site with an overview of the central post office intersection.

text.fr: menus excellent crudités sublime accueille très attentionné dessert à gogo . . . . peut améliorer la carte vins . . . . .
text.en: This review only concerns the bakery. firstly the quality is disappointing, the coup of the best baker in France is only a commercial scam, the quality is not even at the level of industrial bakeries such as Paul. The same goes for the pastries even though they don't go with the back of the spoon when it comes to prices (1000f for a pain au chocolat). but the worst comes from the service with desperately slow and unpleasant waitresses, they never have change and don't care about the customer. hard to swallow when you pay prices worthy of an excellent Parisian bakery!

text.fr: j ' ai aimé la façon de prendre soin du client . la presence des employés de salle à chaque fois qu ' on n ' est dans le besoin , à faire des propositions des plats qui nous ont echappé de vu . vraiment correct ; j ' ai été conquise et je peux vous dire que je reviendrais chaque fois que je me trouverais à yaoundé . merci à toute l ' equipe , bonne continuation et surtout bonne année
text.en: above this French bakery a nice restaurant serving snacks (croque monsieur salad) or dishes or pizzas. Generous and good pizzas. salads giving gastric problems the next morning. . . very good ice cream. a gracious and efficient service even if sometimes a little slow. to do with family without worries

text.fr: il y en a pour tous les goûts ! continental , anglais , africain , toujours avec des produits très frais et de grandes variétés . personnel absolument charmant et prévenant .
text.en: very good address for fresh fruit juices pressed on site and before your eyes. you make your fruit selection yourself. On the other hand, the products from the bakery/pastry section are rather expensive, for a very average taste quality.

text.fr: mon séjour a été mémorable . le safoutier est un bon restaurant le personnel est formidable et le menu était riche et varié . toutes mes félicitations .
text.en: a desire for a “complete” pancake on the bakery floor, calm and pleasant atmosphere, alone or in a group

text.fr: ce restaurant vous propose midi et soir un buffet , alors tous les jours c ' est monotone même si des plats changent . globalement il est de très grande qualité , même si avec le temps les entrées se sont simplifiées service en salle pour vous changer les couverts ou assiette . le plus un large choix de vins aux verres en blanc rosé ou rouge .
text.en: so I was there with a friend who I adore! already the setting is perfect for chatting. you know that little French thing with paintings everywhere we were well received by pretty and kind waitresses. Their burgers were great and I was full. we had ice cream and believe me I didn't regret anything. I almost forgot the music was superb basically great for eating.

text.fr: ce restaurant manque de quelchose : - de personnes chaleureuse - de musiques et d ' un maître de salle qui invite la découverte ! rien à voir ou revoir ! déçu par le personnel fatigué et non avenant !
text.en: located in the center of the city. average restaurant. a little narrow. good meal . a little expensive for its quality. can do better

text.fr: superbe déjeuner . service impeccable . sancerre parfait . un vrai moment de relaxation pour qui n ' est pas habitué a l ' effervescence de yaoundé , la tarte tatin à la a mangue est un des meilleurs desserts jamais degustés .
text.en: restaurant used exclusively for breakfast: good products (coffee and bread) and reasonable prices (6000 xaf - 9 €), at least twice as expensive as the hilton located next door. the big disadvantage is the slowness and coldness of the service: no responsiveness, no smile, all times are serialized. the same scenario happened 4 times out of 4!

text.fr: j ' ai eu l ' honneur de degusté au paradis culinaire du hilton au brunch du dimanche ! l ' accueil était paradisiaque et le buffet divin ! nous avons passé un moment sublime accompagner d ' une diversiter culinaire ! je vous invite a expérimenté ce moment ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! !
text.en: I travel regularly to Yaoundé, this restaurant is one of my favorites for dinner. the rooms overlook gardens, very airy and pleasant. the pastas are excellent, well-cooked dishes, predominantly Italian. the service can sometimes be a little long if you are in the "lower room" the prices are reasonable. I recommend !

text.fr: le safoutier est le restaurant au style brasserie 1900 à ne pas confondre avec la partie buffet située à gauche après l ' entrée de l ' hôtel hilton . ce sont deux endroit bien distincts et la safoutier ne propose qu ' un service à table , à la carte ou au menu . le choix est très large , les plats sont variés et de qualité . un excellent restaurant à yaoundé , l ' un des meilleurs à mon goût . j ' y suis allé à de très nombreuses reprises et je n ' ai jamais été déçu . la carte change assez régulièrement . le personnel est parfait avec une mention spéciale au maitre d ' hôtel m . alfred pour l ' incomparable qualité de son professionnalisme et de son accueil .
text.en: very pleasant setting, for a meeting, clean calm, very good. I will return, good value for money.

text.fr: plusieurs options , choix disponibles , cuisine variés , la seule chose sa prends du temps pour remplacer une assiette vide au buffet . le prix du buffet et 20500cfa et une grande bouteille perrier 6500cfa soit l ' équivalant d ' environ 30 % du montant du buffet .
text.en: unable to regularize a payment visa no payment receipt invalid refusal to recognize the error and demanded a second payment bakery: forgot to give change under loan that no change

text.fr: bon restaurant , avec de bons poissons , et un personnel sympa . service un peu long . petit déjeuner bien aussi .
text.en: the area is nice, the atmosphere and the atmosphere too! menu varies, excellent setting. I recommend it to anyone who wants to go out with friends, have a bite to eat or just have a drink while enjoying a nice panorama at a slight altitude.

text.fr: variété des plats et service très correct avec une personnel dévoué , et attentif ; la fête de la bière ouverte aux résidents de l ' hôtel acueillis sans réservation est une très bonne initiative y compris la choucroute qui accompagne cette fête ; sans la choucroute il n ' y aurait ps de fêre de la bière . merci pour cette fête conviviale .
text.en: mediocre pastry croissant not very good bi pains au chocolat even financiers too much sugar not enough almonds unpleasant waitresses

text.fr: on peut dire qu ' il y a un beau choix . belles viandes grillées , légumes frais , beau dessert et franchement le cadre est sympa . je pense vraiment que c ' est un des restaurants les plus agréable de la ville . ca n ' est pas donné mais bon . . .
text.en: I go there constantly when I want good pastries or good ice cream. the prices are higher than anywhere else but the quality is really there. in addition the setting is cozy and welcoming, the staff is polite too. I recommend without hesitation

text.fr: la nourriture est correcte , même au - dessus de la moyenne , mais cet endroit est fou cher ! ! il sert le petit déjeuner , le déjeuner et le dîner et un buffet changements peu ( ou pas du tout ) d ' un jour à l ' autre , et il faut payer les yeux de la tête pour manger ici !
text.en: Initially it was a bakery run by a Frenchman who had the idea of ​​creating a restaurant above the store. Basic but very good food at a fair price for Yaoundé. . . . as always in Cameroon the service is sometimes long. . . the setting is pleasant and calm.

text.fr: ma famille et moi étions très satisfaits de la qualité du service , de l ' enthousiasme de marcelle et christelle , joseph et eddy
text.en: seeds and dirt in my fruit salad and when I complain I am told that I am not allowed ever again

text.fr: je suis très contente d être passé au brunch ce dimanche . j ' ai été très émue de voir un si grand buffet avec avec un coin cameroun et européen . les mesures barrières respectées . le service de qualité avec des serveurs co me christelle , marcelle , calices et autres . je vous invite à y faire un tour .
text.en: the best ice cream in town is served here. a wide range of flavors is offered and we are spoiled for choice. also the bakery offers varieties of bread that are simply divine!

text.fr: délicieux repas en compagnie des " marginales " . rien à redire tout a été parfait ! mesures barrières respectées tant par le personnel ( christelle , liboire , jean daniel ) que par les clients . je recommande vivement . rdv le 04 pour le brunch new look .
text.en: I loved it every time I went there. the ICES ; the hot dishes and the general setting are also good. I go back every time I have the opportunity and I never regret my choice. I recommend it 100%

text.fr: accueil et service excellent ! un merci particulier à jean daniel et christelle pour la qualité du service . repas excellent et à très vite ! rdv le 4 ! ! !
text.en: located in the city center on Boulevard du 20 Mai, you will find a bakery/pastry/natural fruit juice/ice cream area on the ground floor. upstairs there is a tea room. the service and welcome are better in Douala. natural fruits are good. for the rest the quality has dropped a little compared to the beginning. Also try the bakery which has just opened in Bastos opposite the Goethe Institute and which is great.

text.fr: fortune tatiana victor marcel ont été très professionnels le repas excellent et dans le respect de mesures barrières
text.en: it is a bakery made to measure for the local bourgeoisie. the smallest croissant costs the price of a daily ration for a modest family. I stopped there out of curiosity once and although I have a higher income, it bothers me to buy a butter croissant twice as expensive as in Paris in a poor and very indebted country. I highly recommend the Calafatas or Acropolis bakery

text.fr: repas succulent et les hostesses tres professionelles avec un acceuil chaleureux , tatiana , rosine et marie
text.en: At the ground floor bakery, the bread is not cooked well half the time. Waitresses don't know what that means, neither the service, nor the smile. but in yaoundé, we have no choice. . . in the restaurant upstairs, a poster of “free wifi”, but it never works.

text.fr: service très impeccable , bonne nourriture ambiance chaleureuse à l ' accompagnie de marcelle , marie , daniel tatiana , appolinaire
text.en: great tea room, bread made by a mof best worker in France, you can't find better in France

text.fr: entrée et dessert super goûteux . plats de résistance pauvres peut être à cause du covid . service convivial à souhait et entreprenant . les boissons à volonté sont une amélioration délicieuse . tout le monde est ravi . je recommande . en plus mesures barrières rigoureusement respectées . christelle est un amour de disponibilité . bon dimanche passé .
text.en: a friendly brasserie atmosphere, varied products such as Breton pancakes, pizza and French specialties. the bread is excellent as are the pastries. the homemade ice creams are appreciable as are the coffees. the prices are correct.

text.fr: très bon accueil hôtesses très charmantes tatiana fortune christelle très bonne bouffe . . . . a venir découvrir le buffet varie afro européen . . . poulet choux gratine boeuf au poivre . . .
text.en: Employing them are paid very poorly and are not even affiliated with the CNPS. I would like the manager of the Moulin de France to know because his company is very poorly managed and their employees are treated like slaves. If this situation is not regularized then I must sabotage this company because I have several proofs in hand which could put an end to the existence of this structure. Please regularize this situation as soon as possible. ah good hearer hello.

text.fr: un service impeccable un buffet excellent . cest toujours un plaisir d ' être chez vous hilton sutout accompagné de daniel ibrahim marie clotaire .
text.en: in Europe it's a bit like a snack bar but it seems that in Cameroon, it's a real restaurant. I found efficient service and very good food there. we are upstairs and downstairs there is a French bakery with good bread. the place is a little dark and tight for my taste but frankly, it's not bad. At the bakery, they press juices in front of you with an impressive variety of fruits.

text.fr: top service . marie , ibrahim et voltaire . . . . merci beaucoup . a une prochaine fois . . . . le repas et service est juste au top
text.en: during the day or in the morning upstairs it's a tea room in the evening it's a relaxed restaurant with a small and efficient menu, on the menu pizzas, mega salad, toast and a burger, in short to eat well simply, service rating effective but the speed will mainly depend on whether there are people there or not, it can sometimes get stuck

text.fr: service accueil très chaleureux climat de convivialité . très beau buffet dessert aussi . et surtt satisfaite du service tata marcelle et me clotaire . merci encore le service du safoutier . !
text.en: bakery, pastry shop which offers fast but not shoddy food upstairs. certainly, but it's the site that wants this, dishes which are based more than 50% on the flour element: pizzas, tardines, crepes. we can quickly have gone through the choices (say 5 or 6 types of pizza, 3 types of savory crepes, 5 or 6 types of toast and then, another register, mixed salads. very good. and desserts (ice cream, crepes and cakes to be taken downstairs) satisfactory. drinks more limited in choice but good. too bad the staff, who remain polite, give the impression of always being "burdened" by the arrival of customers. especially sometimes late. and disappears a little too often from the room. That being said, I appreciated being able to be served at 10:30 p.m. upon my arrival from the airport. Friendly setting.

text.fr: mon passage à ce resto fut incroyable par ces amples menus et surtout des déserts à régaler . le service est si accueillant car j ai rencontré une serveuse sur le nom de tata marcelle qui c est occupé de moins quand je voulais quelque chose , vraiment merci aussi à mr clotaire et j ai hâte de revenir .
text.en: tea room in downtown Yaoundé, pastry shop and ice cream parlor and restaurant. The restaurant is not very well stocked, so you cannot expect to eat like in the big restaurants. very cool where you can meet for work, relax, after hours, with family or friends. the magic touch is that there is a very strong, friendly server.

text.fr: service excellent . marie la meilleure et mr . ibrahim aussi . plat de résistance moins n fournit vous pouvez faire mieux .
text.en: contrary to other opinions, I don't find that €10 for a very good pizza (+ free salad as a starter) is exaggerated. even in Europe it would cost more, so why hope for low prices for European products in Africa?

text.fr: le service est performant . c ’ est un endroit paisible paisible le serveur clotaire est disponible et n ’ hésite pas à répondre à toutes mes préoccupations
text.en: tea room, pastry shop and catering, a little expensive of course but good quality, French cuisine for certain dishes, cleanliness and hygiene

text.fr: le service est excellent . c ' est un endroit original pour la détente et pour manger en famille . les serveurs sont toujours disponibles .
text.en: cool, good bread in Cameroon (Yaounde and Douala) as if we were in a European capital etc; , quality service, sincerely very good dishes and super creamy ice creams with varied flavors thank you, I have never seen anywhere else in Africa and long live the emergence of a country which works enormously.

text.fr: détendu , paisible pour manger , discuter , cadre détendu , convivial , et très bon service par mr clotaire .
text.en: too expensive for what is offered. good geographical location, right in the boulevard du 20 mai we don't have much choice.

text.fr: excellent de leopold . . . très bonne ambiance familiale . . . a faire a refaire . . . . la fontaine chocolat était tip top
text.en: Good food overall but prices too high. . . the pastry is OK but the prices are prohibitive.

text.fr: je suis passé au hiltonyaoundé au resto le safoutier à l ' accueil une damme très serviable et pour le
text.en: I sincerely think that we can make bread as good or even better and for a more attractive price.

text.fr: super moment passé au restaurant le safoutier . christelle et rehab ont été très gentilles et nous ont très bien accompagné durant ce moment . merci encore
text.en: This is the best bakery in Yaounde. the different breads, sandwiches, pastries are a real treat.

text.fr: soirée très conviviale avec une musique très douce . l . acceuil très chaleur de christelle et rahab . je pense que je reviendrai
text.en: a bakery, tea room and restaurant quite unique of its kind in Cameroon, with a very pleasant setting overlooking the Cameroonian "Champs Elysées". the decor is superb, "African chic" atmosphere which will delight connoisseurs, even in the employees' outfits which are superb! we also serve the best pizzas I have tasted in Cameroon as well as "made in France" bread which helps combat bouts of nostalgia for French gastronomy. the little financiers with chocolate chips as well as the coconut rocks are to die for! ! !

text.fr: très bon accueil , l ' hôtesse adelina toujours souriante et vraiment professionnelle . service impeccable avec un personnel toujours proche .
text.en: it is a café which has an enviable geographical location. its products are of excellent quality. but the prices are prohibitive for the average Cameroonian. this is perhaps the reason why it is never complete, despite the quality of the setting and the warm and professional staff.

text.fr: super déjeuner ! un buffet avec plein de choix , un accueil au top , les employés étaient au petit soin , surtout léopold , marie , et christelle . je reviendrais ! ! merci à tous
text.en: I liked the very professional service of the waiters, quick to serve and give you useful information about the city.

text.fr: très bon buffet le dimanche . les serveurs sont très accueillants , en particulier sylvianne et christelle .
text.en: when it opened it was probably the best country bread in Yaoundé (there is no baguette there) upstairs a corner for breakfast whose decor is very good however it seems that the master baker has left! ! ! the bread that we are served is now dry 2 hours later and therefore inedible, the only thing that has remained is that it is more expensive than the others. When we had breakfast we had the coffee then the croissants (once the coffee was finished) then the bread. . . when we asked for the rating. . . This is an establishment that is not managed at all! ! too bad because the frame is very good

text.fr: accueil hors du commun de solange staff très professionnel repas très variés plats local très apprécié j aime aussi la barbe a papa la musique dans l ensemble c est super merci
text.en: I tried a number of dishes there (burger, pizza, crepe, pork chops), a terrible disappointment. once my dish of breaded chicken was so bad that the manager had to offer me croissants as compensation so that I didn't leave on an empty stomach. if you are not demanding some dishes can be ok but really it wouldn't have been the setting. . . you might as well go elsewhere.

text.fr: service de qualité , bon accueil et plats délicieux , musique au top ! ! ! merci à rahab pour la disponibilité !
text.en: the bread is excellent, the employees smiling. the tea room allows you to escape from the incessant noise in Yaoundé and the wifi is free!

text.fr: belle découverte culinaire ! je me suis régalée . les plats étaient variés et délicieux par la même occasion .
text.en: yes it's good, it has the merit of existing but unfortunately it was better a few months ago. the croissants and other pastries are oozing with butter, it’s disgusting. the bread is no longer as good as before and I no longer dare eat homemade ice cream, although it is very appetizing. . . .

text.fr: se commentaire est adressé aux clients du hilton connaisez vous les conditions dans les dans les quelle travail le personnel du hilton ?
text.en: the beautiful view of one of the city's main arteries cannot justify an exorbitant price list. more snack than restaurant, this site is located on the floor above a bakery. However, he has an intimate and reserved side which makes him attractive

text.fr: excellentaccueil de solange tres attentive elle est au top elle maitrise son boulot rien a redire sur la qualite du repas
text.en: the Moulin de France combines tasting of French pastries, restaurant and snack bar, the area is well located, pleasant, clean, the staff is welcoming and open, you can eat both pastries and various dishes, which are on the other hand. excellent, but prices are high

text.fr: la bouffe est excellente et l ' accueil est cordial . la musique est un peu trop forte et gêne la conversation .
text.en: This address is worth remembering for a pizza or salad break (accompanied by excellent bread for fans). the setting and the service are correct and the dishes are good and plentiful. the price is acceptable and allows a “restaurant” break for small budgets. a downside for the price of the espresso at 3 euros (given the price range for other products, we don't necessarily expect it and the surprise is unpleasant).

text.fr: accueil chaleureux de solange bon service dans l ensemble millieu chaleureux très apprécié et recommandé à tous pour moi c est le top merci pour le staff
text.en: the food is mainly good in the restaurant upstairs but the service is much too slow. best bakery in town as far as I know at the moment.

text.fr: très bel accueil de solange service de qualité de mari louise staff convivial repas somptueux prompte réaction de tous et toutes
text.en: I went there with my team for breakfast. the service is good and the waitress did everything alone despite the presence of colleagues who did not seem to help her much. very good bread and jam, fresh cocktail juice. good place near hilton and very central.

text.fr: accueil très professionnel et chaleureux . magnifique lieu très beau décor avec un buffet ouvert et un large menu . un personnel serviable et souriant dans un cadre paisible . une cuisine de bonne qualité au goût exquis
text.en: Good choice ! salads, pastas are very generous and varied. . . affordable and good quality. . . Parking is a definite advantage in this downtown area. . . the hotel is presented as a coffee and tea but they are doing better than that! check-in downstairs at the bakery (nice but expensive...)!

text.fr: bel accueil de solange très bon repas varié . qualité du service : très poli et souriante . j ’ ai très apprécié et je pense que j ’ y reviendrai encore . vraiment merci
text.en: Located down the street, opposite the Hilton Yaounde Hotel, this restaurant and bakery is a very good choice for lunch or dinner. The service is wonderful, the food is delicious, and the prices are very low (especially compared to Hilton restaurants). The first time was very good, we ate there twice.

text.fr: très attrayant . les servantes sont serviable et surtout respectueuse des choses . bien de choses à vo
text.en: I can't say much about the cafe/restaurant, but the fresh bread is good, there is good bread, slices of meat, good ice cream and fruit juice. . . My wife prefers the city's bakery. we have come here more often and it is perfect for us.

text.fr: très bon périt déjeuner et attention particulière venant de clotaire qui était vraiment très serviable et aimable
text.en: We had several visits to this small but excellent French restaurant and bakery. just a little problem. . . English is spoken very little. there will surprise you. the meals served upstairs are very well prepared and delicious. thank you frank

text.fr: super petit déjeuner avec des viennoiseries parfaites . le tout dans un hôtel agréable avec un personnel aux petits soins et plein de bonne humeur .
text.en: This hotel is very expensive, you see only locals who are real expatriates. but the pizza is extraordinary, there was a lot of choice and custom orders. the service was acceptable. the restaurant is above a bakery, so there is plenty of activity in the desert.

text.fr: cuisine de très bonne qualite , variee , bon service de l ' ensemble du personnel et surtout de marie louise .
text.en: European average, pastas, pizzas, salads, quiches served in a dark room and dark furniture. the service is good and the toilets are clean. good bakery at street level.

text.fr: tres tres acceuillante et sourriente l hotesse au nom de solange les mots me manquent pour decrire la beaute des desserts c est ce qu il faut pour un 5 etoiles de luxe merci encore
text.en: the staff was very attentive. Only butter croissants were good - but I didn't like the pain au chocolat. was difficult and run down. Cappuccino was very expensive and not very good too.

text.fr: qualité des repas et service impeccables . les plats sont très copieux . merci à ivan pour sa gentillesse et son sourire .
text.en: the quality is good. the breads are wonderful. the ice creams are delicious. the service is slow and not always very friendly!

text.fr: buffet du 13 février au safoutier . excellent comme d habitude surtout les entrées et le dessert ainsi que le jus de fruit naturel . excellent service par marie louise qui était toujours à l ' écoute . bon souvenir
text.en: I have eaten here at least twice a month and have always gotten what I paid for - good service, good food (salads, pizzas, ice creams and pastries are the best in town). Coffee and pastries are a little pricey, but they are good. I wish there was more on the menu.

text.fr: le buffet du dimanche est super bon . rien à redire . la table des entrées fait rêver . celle des desserts fait grossir a vue d ' oeil et les plats chauds sont de bonne qualite .
text.en: I bought fruit bread, bread and other things here. It's expensive but very good. I also had the opportunity to eat twice in the restaurant above the bakery. we really enjoyed a rustic style pizza. Salad was included in the price, but we had no problems as other reviewers have mentioned. The conclusion is that I will return.

text.fr: très bon accueil un personnels souriants et attentif un buffet digne de ce nom nous avons adoré merci
text.en: the best bread around. always fresh and delicious. the choice of food is not great, but what they have is good! I recommend ! ! !

text.fr: bel accueil , une très bonne ambiance , un personnel très émable et un buffet à couper le souffle et très delicieux
text.en: ok, to get there you really need bread. The bakery downstairs probably produces some of Yaounde's best bread and pastries, at astronomical prices. They can make this because no one else makes the same kind of bread. If you like a nice piece of European style bread or pastry and have deep pockets, go! the restaurant upstairs is mixed. the location is easy and the views interesting. it is quite nicely furnished. it also has wi-fi access. The menu is limited and focuses heavily on "lunch items involving bread or salads." These are of good quality, nothing extraordinary but good. The prices are just about acceptable, especially if you like bread. . . However, the service is exceptionally poor, totally out of line with the pretentiousness of the food and prices. I have eaten here at least 10 times and have never had good service. the staff is slow, indifferent, distant. A more varied menu and better staff would propel this place to something truly special. It's nice to come here for a bite, a coffee and a laptop with you for a leisurely lunch.

text.fr: c est un joyau caché parfait pour un dîné un déjeuner c est vraiment somptueux comme buffet l accueil chaleureux par solange merci vraiment je le recommande à toutes personne qui voudrait découvrir
text.en: the tablecloths: first shock. dirty and full of food scraps. slow and nonchalant service. places full of sugar daddies who stare at you and make you uncomfortable but not at all discreet - it feels like a bad place but hey - this is cameroon then when you are finally served it's not really that. Cameroon is full of fresh products, even though the avocados are not fresh, there is a problem not good for these prices no

text.fr: buffet dominical varié , fin et copieux . de nouvelles découvertes à chaque fois . une tarte aux fraises à la frangipane particulièrement réussie ce dimanche .
text.en: a must-visit restaurant for lunch if you are in the city center. The menu is varied and there is something for everyone. on the other hand, you should not be in a hurry at peak times because the restaurant is full and the waiters/waitresses are very busy. I opted for a tasty tropical salad made with avocado and pineapple. for more photos, visit my instagram (ig: kelledstyle) :-)

text.fr: très bon accueil , propreté irréprochable et très bonne qualité des produits , serveurs attentionnés et à l ’ écoute
text.en: It's not just the bread that is excellent, for a pleasant lunch served graciously with kindness and simplicity.

text.fr: restaurant parfait accueil chaleureux merci pour le somptueux repas c est waou ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ça est avec plaisir que je souhaiterai revenir même tout le temps
text.en: a little detour to this place for a breakfast before starting the day. . nice welcome. . setting with a view of the boulevard. . suitable for discussions or family meals. . nice kitchen

text.fr: je recommande une fois de plus ce restaurant qui contient un grand buffet et plusieurs variétés le personnel aussi est très accueillant je tien a remercier clotaire , sandrine ainsi que larissa qui font vraiment attention aux client et qui sont au petit soins
text.en: At first I went there for the pastries. but there I discovered many other treats, including smoothies, espresso and others. the products are fresh and good. the cakes are well made. The only downside is the price, I find it really exorbitant compared to the standard of living in Cameroon.

text.fr: le petit déjeuner sous forme de buffet est excellent et varié ( les grands classiques européens et camerounais ) . les amateurs du petit déjeuner typique camerounais ne seront pas déçus : les beignets haricots bouillis y sont très bons . je recommande !
text.en: the space is pleasant, there is calm, and we can discuss calmly, talk to each other quietly, and enjoy.

text.fr: le service est très accueillant , le cadre est confortable et le repas un véritable régal . j ' y reviendrai .
text.en: it is located in the heart of the city at the central post office. I don't know if they have many other agencies. they do much more in European pastry

text.fr: très convivial . buffet très bon . acceuil parfait . service de qualité . j ' ai vraiment passé un bon moment en famille .
text.en: this place is a pure marvel of delight (cakes etc.) everything is so good, but the price is a little expensive, it is an ideal destination for all gourmets

text.fr: bon accueil , personnel agréable et professionnel , espace apaisant avec un groupe musical en live et de bon repas locaux et internationaux .
text.en: a friendly establishment in the city center where you can enjoy small dishes and salads of good quality; service sometimes a little slow but attentive.

text.fr: décor magnifique , accueil chaleureux et repas excellent c ’ est un lieu adéquat pour des déjeuners entre amis ou d ’ affaire et surtout un excellent rapport qualité - prix . fortement recommandé .
text.en: I stopped there to buy a baguette - which I didn't find famous, by the way - and a cockroach was wandering among the pastries. That was enough of an overview for me.

text.fr: tres bon buffet : belle entrée simple et légère avec sauce bonne organisation et serveurs accueillants et serieux . merci pour l ’ accueil et la propreté , pas de mouches . que du bonheur !
text.en: restaurant which deserves to be known, above the bakery. continuous service . wide choice, salads, burgers, menus, pizzas. very competitive price. relatively fast service. impeccable cleanliness. I recommend eating relatively quickly and simply.

text.fr: j ’ ai beaucoup aimé les plats camerounais et le service est hyper rapide et satisfaisant . je recommande fortement
text.en: too expensive for Cameroon. the bread is fresh, no worries, only downside, with the ambient humidity in Yaoundé, the crispness is non-existent 1 hour later.

text.fr: un très bon accueil , le petit déjeuner est très bon et les serveurs sont toujours très aimables et accueillants .
text.en: The establishment has been losing quality of food and quality of service for some time. It’s a cold hamburger after 40 minutes of waiting that arrived. This one came back in a deplorable state. Anyway, I'll move on to the fries cooked with used oil. burnt plantain etc. . . just the quality of a snack on the street corner, but the price is premium. farewell .

text.fr: très bel accueil par solange convivialité au restaurant très bon plat africain et asiatique star parfait vraiment un seul mot merci
text.en: so the meals are always good, the service quality, the waiters are smiling. and the friendly environment. no matter the type of meal, in my opinion it is an “it” restaurant

text.fr: accueil super service irréprochable bonne enbiance pointée d une bonne musique pour tout couronner d un bon repas merci encore
text.en: the menu has narrowed down, no meats or fish or soup! ! it all comes down to the unbridled flour. . . for an evening dinner, the choice of menus is not great. . . the pizza was good! consolation!

text.fr: le resto tres conviviale . le personnel accueillant gentil et souriant . merci a larissa et marie louise .
text.en: convenient restaurant for a lunch break. the dishes, simple, are correct. The service is friendly but not always fast. the room is very noisy and the cashier never has change.

text.fr: super bien servi accueil tres chaleureux plats très bien fais je dirais excellent encore merci aux staff en particulier larissa , adeline , marcel , dominique , emmanuel , gilles etc . . .
text.en: superb quality breads and pastries and upstairs a tea room - ice cream parlor - restaurant where you can have a wonderful breakfast or lunch or even enjoy a succulent artisanal ice cream. superb place!

text.fr: bonne accueil , très bon buffet très bon service bref excellent de meilleur met traditionnelle le safoutier c ' est juste excellent
text.en: the bakery is too expensive for nothing, I haven't found anything famous in terms of taste! we sell things by the gram! the restaurant is small but quite cozy, ideal for an intimate celebration. the cuisine is not famous but good. . . I didn't like the service at all.

text.fr: excellent accuei ( super travail christelle ! - ) l , cuisine variée et d ' excellent niveau des entrées au dessert : bravo ! parfait après une bonne journée de travail
text.en: during a lunch break, I went there to taste their dish in the form of salad, fries and quiche or pizza or croque monsieur, I really enjoyed the very copious dish, the service is a little slow, the reception is absent, but the food in general is good, the atmosphere too,

text.fr: on a passé un très bon moment . de l ' équipe , au repas à l ' ambiance musicale ! on reviendra . très beau cadre
text.en: a family of 5: good breakfast but still for 70,000. OK but we'll only go to buy our baguette :)

text.fr: le petit déjeuner est impeccable et les serveurs apportent la chaleur au clients vrement il sont a la hauteurs
text.en: The Moulin de France is great for bread and pastries. the pastries suck. As for the restaurant, it's not bad, nothing extravagant, ok for a quick lunch. but the problem is that the service is super slow. . .

text.fr: l ' argent ne vaut pas la qualité du service rendu . c ' était merveilleux de déguster les mets d ' ici et d ' ailleurs . nous avons passé un moment inoubliable
text.en: very good service, welcoming staff, slow service, very good salads, friendly setting makes you want to come back

text.fr: c ’ est un excellent restaurant qui sait mettre en valeur autant le cuisine camerounaise que celle des autres pays . le buffet est extrêmement varié et les produits sont tous frais .
text.en: off-the-scale pastry flavors. I like to go there when I want to treat myself. first of all the setting, it is clean and welcoming. the staff are polite and informative. the offerings behind the window, quite simply a delight. all this reflects a well-organized and serious team which puts itself at the service of the customer to please and satisfy them.

text.fr: très beau moment passé à ce restaurant . j ' ai apprécié la politesse et le professionnalisme des hôtesses . continuez comme ça . merci .
text.en: very good bakery and ice cream parlor, but no pastry shop. the tea room allows you to consume some on site with an overview of the central post office intersection.

text.fr: je me retrouve ce soir au safoutier yaounde hilton en famille grâce à un concours sur facebook . soirée excellente , le cadre agréable et accueillant , le service impeccable , le buffet et toutes les saveurs proposées juste un délice pour le palais de tous gourmets . l ' orchestre de vrais professionnels de l ' art de la musique , les percussions . en général un avis excellent , merci au safoutier et à tout son personnel et bien - sûr aux bons soins de solange et de rahab .
text.en: This review only concerns the bakery. firstly the quality is disappointing, the coup of the best baker in France is only a commercial scam, the quality is not even at the level of industrial bakeries such as Paul. The same goes for the pastries even though they don't go with the back of the spoon when it comes to prices (1000f for a pain au chocolat). but the worst comes from the service with desperately slow and unpleasant waitresses, they never have change and don't care about the customer. hard to swallow when you pay prices worthy of an excellent Parisian bakery!

text.fr: un brunch très appétissant . le cadre est accueillant et convivial . l ' ambiance est très cool . les menus sont très variés et excellents particulierement le dessert . le personnel est super sympathique et nous remercions liboire , sylviane et larissa pour ces moments particuliers .
text.en: above this French bakery a nice restaurant serving snacks (croque monsieur salad) or dishes or pizzas. Generous and good pizzas. salads giving gastric problems the next morning. . . very good ice cream. a gracious and efficient service even if sometimes a little slow. to do with family without worries

text.fr: c est avec grand sourire et amour que solange c est toujours occuper de nous je recommande ce restaurant a tous et toute service de qualité liboire maître d hôtel très proactif et son équipe repas très variés merci une rose pour solange merci merci
text.en: very good address for fresh fruit juices pressed on site and before your eyes. you make your fruit selection yourself. On the other hand, the products from the bakery/pastry section are rather expensive, for a very average taste quality.

text.fr: passé le contrôle sécurité , désormais nécessaire partout dans le monde , le hall présente un décor sobre et chaleureux . l ' accueil est très courtois et tout le personnel très disponible . le restaurant , aussi bien en intérieur que dehors près de la piscine , propose une cuisine variée et très bonne ( excellent petit - déjeuner ) . les chambres sont confortables avec une bonne climatisation bien que pas assez silencieuse . bar du dernier étage très agréable avec d ' excellentes musiques .
text.en: a desire for a “complete” pancake on the bakery floor, calm and pleasant atmosphere, alone or in a group

text.fr: c ' est waouuuu ! solage et clotaire , chapeau vous êtes super ! ! ! l ' accueil est le service sont au rendez - vous . je suis très très satisfait . allez de l ' avant
text.en: so I was there with a friend who I adore! already the setting is perfect for chatting. you know that little French thing with paintings everywhere we were well received by pretty and kind waitresses. Their burgers were great and I was full. we had ice cream and believe me I didn't regret anything. I almost forgot the music was superb basically great for eating.

text.fr: accueil chaleureux par solange et le staff . repas délicieux qui invite a une prochaine visite très très heureux d être encore et encore avec vous mille merci
text.en: located in the center of the city. average restaurant. a little narrow. good meal . a little expensive for its quality. can do better

text.fr: accueil cordial , personnel toujours très sympathique ! en outre le buffet pour le petit - déjeuner est varié et bien fourni .
text.en: restaurant used exclusively for breakfast: good products (coffee and bread) and reasonable prices (6000 xaf - 9 €), at least twice as expensive as the hilton located next door. the big disadvantage is the slowness and coldness of the service: no responsiveness, no smile, all times are serialized. the same scenario happened 4 times out of 4!

text.fr: salé , sucré , chaud , frais . . . l ' embarras du choix ! les produits sont frais et personnel très serviable .
text.en: I travel regularly to Yaoundé, this restaurant is one of my favorites for dinner. the rooms overlook gardens, very airy and pleasant. the pastas are excellent, well-cooked dishes, predominantly Italian. the service can sometimes be a little long if you are in the "lower room" the prices are reasonable. I recommend !

text.fr: je ne trouve vraiment rien à redire , lorsque j ' ai besoin de me trouver avec des amis ou des collègues pour nous restaurer , dans un coin qui reuni à la fois : un grand professionnalisme du personnel , propreté , le menu tant qualitatif que varié , eh bien je ne cherche pas longtemps , le safoutier est le coin tout indiqué
text.en: very pleasant setting, for a meeting, clean calm, very good. I will return, good value for money.

text.fr: un personnel toujours très sympa et aux petits soins et une cuisine raffinée ( les gambas . . . ! ! ! ) merci à tous frédéric bard
text.en: unable to regularize a payment visa no payment receipt invalid refusal to recognize the error and demanded a second payment bakery: forgot to give change under loan that no change

text.fr: le personnel y est chaleureux et prévenant ( j ' ai même pu garder le stylo de l ' une des filles de salle ) ; la nourriture variée , délicate et goûteuse . . . des prix certes assez élevés . mais pour ce standing et cette ambiance très agréable , j ' aime tout simplement ce restaurant
text.en: the area is nice, the atmosphere and the atmosphere too! menu varies, excellent setting. I recommend it to anyone who wants to go out with friends, have a bite to eat or just have a drink while enjoying a nice panorama at a slight altitude.

text.fr: le service est bien . la nourriture est bien et il y en a pour tous les goûts , mais les prix sont exorbitant et dépasse de beaucoup ce qu ' on pourrait payer dans un hilton en amérique du nord .
text.en: mediocre pastry croissant not very good bi pains au chocolat even financiers too much sugar not enough almonds unpleasant waitresses

text.fr: menus excellent crudités sublime accueille très attentionné dessert à gogo . . . . peut améliorer la carte vins . . . . .
text.en: I go there constantly when I want good pastries or good ice cream. the prices are higher than anywhere else but the quality is really there. in addition the setting is cozy and welcoming, the staff is polite too. I recommend without hesitation

text.fr: j ' ai aimé la façon de prendre soin du client . la presence des employés de salle à chaque fois qu ' on n ' est dans le besoin , à faire des propositions des plats qui nous ont echappé de vu . vraiment correct ; j ' ai été conquise et je peux vous dire que je reviendrais chaque fois que je me trouverais à yaoundé . merci à toute l ' equipe , bonne continuation et surtout bonne année
text.en: Initially it was a bakery run by a Frenchman who had the idea of ​​creating a restaurant above the store. Basic but very good food at a fair price for Yaoundé. . . . as always in Cameroon the service is sometimes long. . . the setting is pleasant and calm.

text.fr: il y en a pour tous les goûts ! continental , anglais , africain , toujours avec des produits très frais et de grandes variétés . personnel absolument charmant et prévenant .
text.en: seeds and dirt in my fruit salad and when I complain I am told that I am not allowed ever again

text.fr: mon séjour a été mémorable . le safoutier est un bon restaurant le personnel est formidable et le menu était riche et varié . toutes mes félicitations .
text.en: the best ice cream in town is served here. a wide range of flavors is offered and we are spoiled for choice. also the bakery offers varieties of bread that are simply divine!

text.fr: ce restaurant vous propose midi et soir un buffet , alors tous les jours c ' est monotone même si des plats changent . globalement il est de très grande qualité , même si avec le temps les entrées se sont simplifiées service en salle pour vous changer les couverts ou assiette . le plus un large choix de vins aux verres en blanc rosé ou rouge .
text.en: I loved it every time I went there. the ICES ; the hot dishes and the general setting are also good. I go back every time I have the opportunity and I never regret my choice. I recommend it 100%

text.fr: ce restaurant manque de quelchose : - de personnes chaleureuse - de musiques et d ' un maître de salle qui invite la découverte ! rien à voir ou revoir ! déçu par le personnel fatigué et non avenant !
text.en: located in the city center on Boulevard du 20 Mai, you will find a bakery/pastry/natural fruit juice/ice cream area on the ground floor. upstairs there is a tea room. the service and welcome are better in Douala. natural fruits are good. for the rest the quality has dropped a little compared to the beginning. Also try the bakery which has just opened in Bastos opposite the Goethe Institute and which is great.

text.fr: superbe déjeuner . service impeccable . sancerre parfait . un vrai moment de relaxation pour qui n ' est pas habitué a l ' effervescence de yaoundé , la tarte tatin à la a mangue est un des meilleurs desserts jamais degustés .
text.en: it is a bakery made to measure for the local bourgeoisie. the smallest croissant costs the price of a daily ration for a modest family. I stopped there out of curiosity once and although I have a higher income, it bothers me to buy a butter croissant twice as expensive as in Paris in a poor and very indebted country. I highly recommend the Calafatas or Acropolis bakery

text.fr: j ' ai eu l ' honneur de degusté au paradis culinaire du hilton au brunch du dimanche ! l ' accueil était paradisiaque et le buffet divin ! nous avons passé un moment sublime accompagner d ' une diversiter culinaire ! je vous invite a expérimenté ce moment ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! !
text.en: At the ground floor bakery, the bread is not cooked well half the time. Waitresses don't know what that means, neither the service, nor the smile. but in yaoundé, we have no choice. . . in the restaurant upstairs, a poster of “free wifi”, but it never works.

text.fr: le safoutier est le restaurant au style brasserie 1900 à ne pas confondre avec la partie buffet située à gauche après l ' entrée de l ' hôtel hilton . ce sont deux endroit bien distincts et la safoutier ne propose qu ' un service à table , à la carte ou au menu . le choix est très large , les plats sont variés et de qualité . un excellent restaurant à yaoundé , l ' un des meilleurs à mon goût . j ' y suis allé à de très nombreuses reprises et je n ' ai jamais été déçu . la carte change assez régulièrement . le personnel est parfait avec une mention spéciale au maitre d ' hôtel m . alfred pour l ' incomparable qualité de son professionnalisme et de son accueil .
text.en: great tea room, bread made by a mof best worker in France, you can't find better in France

text.fr: plusieurs options , choix disponibles , cuisine variés , la seule chose sa prends du temps pour remplacer une assiette vide au buffet . le prix du buffet et 20500cfa et une grande bouteille perrier 6500cfa soit l ' équivalant d ' environ 30 % du montant du buffet .
text.en: a friendly brasserie atmosphere, varied products such as Breton pancakes, pizza and French specialties. the bread is excellent as are the pastries. the homemade ice creams are appreciable as are the coffees. the prices are correct.

text.fr: bon restaurant , avec de bons poissons , et un personnel sympa . service un peu long . petit déjeuner bien aussi .
text.en: Employing them are paid very poorly and are not even affiliated with the CNPS. I would like the manager of the Moulin de France to know because his company is very poorly managed and their employees are treated like slaves. If this situation is not regularized then I must sabotage this company because I have several proofs in hand which could put an end to the existence of this structure. Please regularize this situation as soon as possible. ah good hearer hello.

text.fr: variété des plats et service très correct avec une personnel dévoué , et attentif ; la fête de la bière ouverte aux résidents de l ' hôtel acueillis sans réservation est une très bonne initiative y compris la choucroute qui accompagne cette fête ; sans la choucroute il n ' y aurait ps de fêre de la bière . merci pour cette fête conviviale .
text.en: in Europe it's a bit like a snack bar but it seems that in Cameroon, it's a real restaurant. I found efficient service and very good food there. we are upstairs and downstairs there is a French bakery with good bread. the place is a little dark and tight for my taste but frankly, it's not bad. At the bakery, they press juices in front of you with an impressive variety of fruits.

text.fr: on peut dire qu ' il y a un beau choix . belles viandes grillées , légumes frais , beau dessert et franchement le cadre est sympa . je pense vraiment que c ' est un des restaurants les plus agréable de la ville . ca n ' est pas donné mais bon . . .
text.en: during the day or in the morning upstairs it's a tea room in the evening it's a relaxed restaurant with a small and efficient menu, on the menu pizzas, mega salad, toast and a burger, in short to eat well simply, service rating effective but the speed will mainly depend on whether there are people there or not, it can sometimes get stuck

text.fr: la nourriture est correcte , même au - dessus de la moyenne , mais cet endroit est fou cher ! ! il sert le petit déjeuner , le déjeuner et le dîner et un buffet changements peu ( ou pas du tout ) d ' un jour à l ' autre , et il faut payer les yeux de la tête pour manger ici !
text.en: bakery, pastry shop which offers fast but not shoddy food upstairs. certainly, but it's the site that wants this, dishes which are based more than 50% on the flour element: pizzas, tardines, crepes. we can quickly have gone through the choices (say 5 or 6 types of pizza, 3 types of savory crepes, 5 or 6 types of toast and then, another register, mixed salads. very good. and desserts (ice cream, crepes and cakes to take downstairs) satisfactory. drinks with a more limited choice but good. too bad the staff, who remain polite, give the impression of always being "burdened" by the arrival of customers. especially sometimes late. and disappear a little too often from the room. That being said, I appreciated being able to be served at 10:30 p.m. upon my arrival from the airport. Friendly setting.

text.fr: ma famille et moi étions très satisfaits de la qualité du service , de l ' enthousiasme de marcelle et christelle , joseph et eddy
text.en: tea room in downtown Yaoundé, pastry shop and ice cream parlor and restaurant. The restaurant is not very well stocked, so you cannot expect to eat like in the big restaurants. very cool where you can meet for work, relax, after hours, with family or friends. the magic touch is that there is a very strong, friendly server.

text.fr: je suis très contente d être passé au brunch ce dimanche . j ' ai été très émue de voir un si grand buffet avec avec un coin cameroun et européen . les mesures barrières respectées . le service de qualité avec des serveurs co me christelle , marcelle , calices et autres . je vous invite à y faire un tour .
text.en: contrary to other opinions, I don't find that €10 for a very good pizza (+ free salad as a starter) is exaggerated. even in Europe it would cost more, so why hope for low prices for European products in Africa?

text.fr: délicieux repas en compagnie des " marginales " . rien à redire tout a été parfait ! mesures barrières respectées tant par le personnel ( christelle , liboire , jean daniel ) que par les clients . je recommande vivement . rdv le 04 pour le brunch new look .
text.en: tea room, pastry shop and catering, a little expensive of course but good quality, French cuisine for certain dishes, cleanliness and hygiene

text.fr: accueil et service excellent ! un merci particulier à jean daniel et christelle pour la qualité du service . repas excellent et à très vite ! rdv le 4 ! ! !
text.en: cool, good bread in Cameroon (Yaounde and Douala) as if we were in a European capital etc; , quality service, sincerely very good dishes and super creamy ice creams with varied flavors thank you, I have never seen anywhere else in Africa and long live the emergence of a country which works enormously.

text.fr: fortune tatiana victor marcel ont été très professionnels le repas excellent et dans le respect de mesures barrières
text.en: too expensive for what is offered. good geographical location, in the middle of boulevard du 20 mai we don't have much choice.

text.fr: repas succulent et les hostesses tres professionelles avec un acceuil chaleureux , tatiana , rosine et marie
text.en: Good food overall but prices too high. . . the pastry is OK but the prices are prohibitive.

text.fr: service très impeccable , bonne nourriture ambiance chaleureuse à l ' accompagnie de marcelle , marie , daniel tatiana , appolinaire
text.en: I sincerely think that we can make bread as good or even better and for a more attractive price.

text.fr: entrée et dessert super goûteux . plats de résistance pauvres peut être à cause du covid . service convivial à souhait et entreprenant . les boissons à volonté sont une amélioration délicieuse . tout le monde est ravi . je recommande . en plus mesures barrières rigoureusement respectées . christelle est un amour de disponibilité . bon dimanche passé .
text.en: This is the best bakery in Yaounde. the different breads, sandwiches, pastries are a real treat.

text.fr: très bon accueil hôtesses très charmantes tatiana fortune christelle très bonne bouffe . . . . a venir découvrir le buffet varie afro européen . . . poulet choux gratine boeuf au poivre . . .
text.en: a bakery, tea room and restaurant quite unique of its kind in Cameroon, with a very pleasant setting overlooking the Cameroonian "Champs Elysées". the decor is superb, "African chic" atmosphere which will delight connoisseurs, even in the employees' outfits which are superb! we also serve the best pizzas I have tasted in Cameroon as well as "made in France" bread which helps combat bouts of nostalgia for French gastronomy. the little financiers with chocolate chips as well as the coconut rocks are to die for! ! !

text.fr: un service impeccable un buffet excellent . cest toujours un plaisir d ' être chez vous hilton sutout accompagné de daniel ibrahim marie clotaire .
text.en: it is a café which has an enviable geographical location. its products are of excellent quality. but the prices are prohibitive for the average Cameroonian. this is perhaps the reason why it is never complete, despite the quality of the setting and the warm and professional staff.

text.fr: top service . marie , ibrahim et voltaire . . . . merci beaucoup . a une prochaine fois . . . . le repas et service est juste au top
text.en: I liked the very professional service of the waiters, quick to serve and give you useful information about the city.

text.fr: service accueil très chaleureux climat de convivialité . très beau buffet dessert aussi . et surtt satisfaite du service tata marcelle et me clotaire . merci encore le service du safoutier . !
text.en: when it opened it was probably the best country bread in Yaoundé (there is no baguette there) upstairs a corner for breakfast whose decor is very good however it seems that the master baker has left! ! ! the bread that we are served is now dry 2 hours later and therefore inedible, the only thing that has remained is that it is more expensive than the others. When we had breakfast we had the coffee then the croissants (once the coffee was finished) then the bread. . . when we asked for the rating. . . This is an establishment that is not managed at all! ! too bad because the frame is very good

text.fr: mon passage à ce resto fut incroyable par ces amples menus et surtout des déserts à régaler . le service est si accueillant car j ai rencontré une serveuse sur le nom de tata marcelle qui c est occupé de moins quand je voulais quelque chose , vraiment merci aussi à mr clotaire et j ai hâte de revenir .
text.en: I tried a number of dishes there (burger, pizza, crepe, pork chops), a terrible disappointment. once my dish of breaded chicken was so bad that the manager had to offer me croissants as compensation so that I didn't leave on an empty stomach. if you are not demanding some dishes can be ok but really it wouldn't have been the setting. . . you might as well go elsewhere.

text.fr: service excellent . marie la meilleure et mr . ibrahim aussi . plat de résistance moins n fournit vous pouvez faire mieux .
text.en: the bread is excellent, the employees smiling. the tea room allows you to escape from the incessant noise in Yaoundé and the wifi is free!

text.fr: le service est performant . c ’ est un endroit paisible paisible le serveur clotaire est disponible et n ’ hésite pas à répondre à toutes mes préoccupations
text.en: yes it's good, it has the merit of existing but unfortunately it was better a few months ago. the croissants and other pastries are oozing with butter, it’s disgusting. the bread is no longer as good as before and I no longer dare eat homemade ice cream, although it is very appetizing. . . .

text.fr: le service est excellent . c ' est un endroit original pour la détente et pour manger en famille . les serveurs sont toujours disponibles .
text.en: the beautiful view of one of the city's main arteries cannot justify an exorbitant price list. more snack than restaurant, this site is located on the floor above a bakery. However, he has an intimate and reserved side which makes him attractive

text.fr: détendu , paisible pour manger , discuter , cadre détendu , convivial , et très bon service par mr clotaire .
text.en: the Moulin de France combines tasting of French pastries, restaurant and snack bar, the area is well located, pleasant, clean, the staff is welcoming and open, you can eat both pastries and various dishes, which are on the other hand. excellent, but prices are high

text.fr: excellent de leopold . . . très bonne ambiance familiale . . . a faire a refaire . . . . la fontaine chocolat était tip top
text.en: This address is worth remembering for a pizza or salad break (accompanied by excellent bread for fans). the setting and the service are correct and the dishes are good and plentiful. the price is acceptable and allows a “restaurant” break for small budgets. a downside for the price of the espresso at 3 euros (given the price range for other products, we don't necessarily expect it and the surprise is unpleasant).

text.fr: je suis passé au hiltonyaoundé au resto le safoutier à l ' accueil une damme très serviable et pour le
text.en: the food is mainly good in the restaurant upstairs but the service is much too slow. best bakery in town as far as I know at the moment.

text.fr: super moment passé au restaurant le safoutier . christelle et rehab ont été très gentilles et nous ont très bien accompagné durant ce moment . merci encore
text.en: I went there with my team for breakfast. the service is good and the waitress did everything alone despite the presence of colleagues who did not seem to help her much. very good bread and jam, fresh cocktail juice. good place near hilton and very central.

text.fr: soirée très conviviale avec une musique très douce . l . acceuil très chaleur de christelle et rahab . je pense que je reviendrai
text.en: Good choice ! salads, pastas are very generous and varied. . . affordable and good quality. . . Parking is a definite advantage in this downtown area. . . the hotel is presented as a coffee and tea but they are doing better than that! check-in downstairs at the bakery (nice but expensive...)!

text.fr: très bon accueil , l ' hôtesse adelina toujours souriante et vraiment professionnelle . service impeccable avec un personnel toujours proche .
text.en: Located down the street, opposite the Hilton Yaoundé Hotel, this restaurant and bakery is a very good choice for lunch or dinner. The service is wonderful, the food is delicious, and the prices are very low (especially compared to Hilton restaurants). The first time was very good, we ate there twice.

text.fr: super déjeuner ! un buffet avec plein de choix , un accueil au top , les employés étaient au petit soin , surtout léopold , marie , et christelle . je reviendrais ! ! merci à tous
text.en: I can't say much about the cafe/restaurant, but the fresh bread is good, there is good bread, slices of meat, good ice cream and fruit juice. . . My wife prefers the city's bakery. we have come here more often and it is perfect for us.

text.fr: très bon buffet le dimanche . les serveurs sont très accueillants , en particulier sylvianne et christelle .
text.en: We had several visits to this small but excellent French restaurant and bakery. just a little problem. . . English is spoken very little. there will surprise you. the meals served upstairs are very well prepared and delicious. thank you frank

text.fr: accueil hors du commun de solange staff très professionnel repas très variés plats local très apprécié j aime aussi la barbe a papa la musique dans l ensemble c est super merci
text.en: This hotel is very expensive, you see only locals who are real expatriates. but the pizza is extraordinary, there was a lot of choice and custom orders. the service was acceptable. the restaurant is above a bakery, so there is plenty of activity in the desert.

text.fr: service de qualité , bon accueil et plats délicieux , musique au top ! ! ! merci à rahab pour la disponibilité !
text.en: European average, pastas, pizzas, salads, quiches served in a dark room and dark furniture. the service is good and the toilets are clean. good bakery at street level.

text.fr: belle découverte culinaire ! je me suis régalée . les plats étaient variés et délicieux par la même occasion .
text.en: the staff was very attentive. Only butter croissants were good - but I didn't like the pain au chocolat. was difficult and run down. Cappuccino was very expensive and not very good too.

text.fr: se commentaire est adressé aux clients du hilton connaisez vous les conditions dans les dans les quelle travail le personnel du hilton ?
text.en: the quality is good. the breads are wonderful. the ice creams are delicious. the service is slow and not always very friendly!

text.fr: excellentaccueil de solange tres attentive elle est au top elle maitrise son boulot rien a redire sur la qualite du repas
text.en: I have eaten here at least twice a month and have always gotten what I paid for - good service, good food (salads, pizzas, ice creams and pastries are the best in town). Coffee and pastries are a little pricey, but they are good. I wish there was more on the menu.

text.fr: la bouffe est excellente et l ' accueil est cordial . la musique est un peu trop forte et gêne la conversation .
text.en: I bought fruit bread, bread and other things here. It's expensive but very good. I also had the opportunity to eat twice in the restaurant above the bakery. we really enjoyed a rustic style pizza. Salad was included in the price, but we had no problems as other reviewers have mentioned. The conclusion is that I will return.

text.fr: accueil chaleureux de solange bon service dans l ensemble millieu chaleureux très apprécié et recommandé à tous pour moi c est le top merci pour le staff
text.en: the best bread around. always fresh and delicious. the choice of food is not great, but what they have is good! I recommend ! ! !

text.fr: très bel accueil de solange service de qualité de mari louise staff convivial repas somptueux prompte réaction de tous et toutes
text.en: ok, to get there you really need bread. The bakery downstairs probably produces some of Yaoundé's best bread and pastries, at astronomical prices. They can make this because no one else makes the same kind of bread. If you like a nice piece of European style bread or pastry and have deep pockets, go! the restaurant upstairs is mixed. the location is easy and the views interesting. it is quite nicely furnished. it also has wi-fi access. The menu is limited and focuses heavily on "lunch items involving bread or salads." These are of good quality, nothing extraordinary but good. The prices are just about acceptable, especially if you like bread. . . However, the service is exceptionally poor, totally out of line with the pretentiousness of the food and prices. I have eaten here at least 10 times and have never had good service. the staff is slow, indifferent, distant. A more varied menu and better staff would propel this place to something truly special. It's nice to come here for a bite, a coffee and a laptop with you for a leisurely lunch.

text.fr: accueil très professionnel et chaleureux . magnifique lieu très beau décor avec un buffet ouvert et un large menu . un personnel serviable et souriant dans un cadre paisible . une cuisine de bonne qualité au goût exquis
text.en: the tablecloths: first shock. dirty and full of food scraps. slow and nonchalant service. places full of sugar daddies who stare at you and make you uncomfortable but not at all discreet - it feels like a bad place but hey - this is cameroon then when you are finally served it's not really that. Cameroon is full of fresh products, even though the avocados are not fresh, there is a problem not good for these prices no

text.fr: bel accueil de solange très bon repas varié . qualité du service : très poli et souriante . j ’ ai très apprécié et je pense que j ’ y reviendrai encore . vraiment merci
text.en: a must-visit restaurant for lunch if you are in the city center. The menu is varied and there is something for everyone. on the other hand, you should not be in a hurry at peak times because the restaurant is full and the waiters/waitresses are very busy. I opted for a tasty tropical salad made with avocado and pineapple. for more photos, visit my instagram (ig: kelledstyle) :-)

text.fr: très attrayant . les servantes sont serviable et surtout respectueuse des choses . bien de choses à vo
text.en: It's not just the bread that is excellent, for a pleasant lunch served graciously with kindness and simplicity.

text.fr: très bon périt déjeuner et attention particulière venant de clotaire qui était vraiment très serviable et aimable
text.en: a little detour to this place for a breakfast before starting the day. . nice welcome. . setting with a view of the boulevard. . suitable for discussions or family meals. . nice kitchen

text.fr: super petit déjeuner avec des viennoiseries parfaites . le tout dans un hôtel agréable avec un personnel aux petits soins et plein de bonne humeur .
text.en: At first I went there for the pastries. but there I discovered many other treats, including smoothies, espresso and others. the products are fresh and good. the cakes are well made. The only downside is the price, I find it really exorbitant compared to the standard of living in Cameroon.

text.fr: cuisine de très bonne qualite , variee , bon service de l ' ensemble du personnel et surtout de marie louise .
text.en: the space is pleasant, there is calm, and we can discuss calmly, talk to each other quietly, and enjoy.

text.fr: tres tres acceuillante et sourriente l hotesse au nom de solange les mots me manquent pour decrire la beaute des desserts c est ce qu il faut pour un 5 etoiles de luxe merci encore
text.en: it is located in the heart of the city at the central post office. I don't know if they have many other agencies. they do much more in European pastry

text.fr: qualité des repas et service impeccables . les plats sont très copieux . merci à ivan pour sa gentillesse et son sourire .
text.en: this place is a pure marvel of delight (cakes etc.) everything is so good, but the price is a little expensive, it is an ideal destination for all gourmets

text.fr: buffet du 13 février au safoutier . excellent comme d habitude surtout les entrées et le dessert ainsi que le jus de fruit naturel . excellent service par marie louise qui était toujours à l ' écoute . bon souvenir
text.en: a friendly establishment in the city center where you can enjoy small dishes and salads of good quality; service sometimes a little slow but attentive.

text.fr: le buffet du dimanche est super bon . rien à redire . la table des entrées fait rêver . celle des desserts fait grossir a vue d ' oeil et les plats chauds sont de bonne qualite .
text.en: I stopped there to buy a baguette - which I didn't find famous, by the way - and a cockroach was wandering among the pastries. That was enough of an overview for me.

text.fr: très bon accueil un personnels souriants et attentif un buffet digne de ce nom nous avons adoré merci
text.en: restaurant which deserves to be known, above the bakery. continuous service . wide choice, salads, burgers, menus, pizzas. very competitive price. relatively fast service. impeccable cleanliness. I recommend eating relatively quickly and simply.

text.fr: bel accueil , une très bonne ambiance , un personnel très émable et un buffet à couper le souffle et très delicieux
text.en: too expensive for Cameroon. the bread is fresh, no worries, only downside, with the ambient humidity in Yaoundé, the crispness is non-existent 1 hour later.

text.fr: c est un joyau caché parfait pour un dîné un déjeuner c est vraiment somptueux comme buffet l accueil chaleureux par solange merci vraiment je le recommande à toutes personne qui voudrait découvrir
text.en: The establishment has been losing quality of food and quality of service for some time. It’s a cold hamburger after 40 minutes of waiting that arrived. This one came back in a deplorable state. Anyway, I'll move on to the fries cooked with used oil. burnt plantain etc. . . just the quality of a snack on the street corner, but the price is premium. farewell .

text.fr: buffet dominical varié , fin et copieux . de nouvelles découvertes à chaque fois . une tarte aux fraises à la frangipane particulièrement réussie ce dimanche .
text.en: so the meals are always good, the service quality, the waiters are smiling. and the friendly environment. no matter the type of meal, in my opinion it is an “it” restaurant

text.fr: très bon accueil , propreté irréprochable et très bonne qualité des produits , serveurs attentionnés et à l ’ écoute
text.en: the menu has narrowed down, no meats or fish or soup! ! it all comes down to the unbridled flour. . . for an evening dinner, the choice of menus is not great. . . the pizza was good! consolation!

text.fr: restaurant parfait accueil chaleureux merci pour le somptueux repas c est waou ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ça est avec plaisir que je souhaiterai revenir même tout le temps
text.en: convenient restaurant for a lunch break. the dishes, simple, are correct. The service is friendly but not always fast. the room is very noisy and the cashier never has change.

text.fr: je recommande une fois de plus ce restaurant qui contient un grand buffet et plusieurs variétés le personnel aussi est très accueillant je tien a remercier clotaire , sandrine ainsi que larissa qui font vraiment attention aux client et qui sont au petit soins
text.en: superb quality breads and pastries and upstairs a tea room - ice cream parlor - restaurant where you can have a wonderful breakfast or lunch or even enjoy a succulent artisanal ice cream. superb place!

text.fr: le petit déjeuner sous forme de buffet est excellent et varié ( les grands classiques européens et camerounais ) . les amateurs du petit déjeuner typique camerounais ne seront pas déçus : les beignets haricots bouillis y sont très bons . je recommande !
text.en: the bakery is too expensive for nothing, I haven't found anything famous in terms of taste! we sell things by the gram! the restaurant is small but quite cozy, ideal for an intimate celebration. the cuisine is not famous but good. . . I didn't like the service at all.

text.fr: le service est très accueillant , le cadre est confortable et le repas un véritable régal . j ' y reviendrai .
text.en: during a lunch break, I went there to taste their dish in the form of salad, fries and quiche or pizza or croque monsieur, I really enjoyed the very copious dish, the service is a little slow, the reception is absent, but the food in general is good, the atmosphere too,

text.fr: très convivial . buffet très bon . acceuil parfait . service de qualité . j ' ai vraiment passé un bon moment en famille .
text.en: a family of 5: good breakfast but still for 70,000. OK but we'll only go to buy our baguette :)

text.fr: bon accueil , personnel agréable et professionnel , espace apaisant avec un groupe musical en live et de bon repas locaux et internationaux .
text.en: The Moulin de France is great for bread and pastries. the pastries suck. As for the restaurant, it's not bad, nothing extravagant, ok for a quick lunch. but the problem is that the service is super slow. . .

text.fr: décor magnifique , accueil chaleureux et repas excellent c ’ est un lieu adéquat pour des déjeuners entre amis ou d ’ affaire et surtout un excellent rapport qualité - prix . fortement recommandé .
text.en: very good service, welcoming staff, slow service, very good salads, friendly setting makes you want to come back

text.fr: tres bon buffet : belle entrée simple et légère avec sauce bonne organisation et serveurs accueillants et serieux . merci pour l ’ accueil et la propreté , pas de mouches . que du bonheur !
text.en: off-the-scale pastry flavors. I like to go there when I want to treat myself. first of all the setting, it is clean and welcoming. the staff are polite and informative. the offerings behind the window, quite simply a delight. all this reflects a well-organized and serious team which puts itself at the service of the customer to please and satisfy them.

text.fr: j ’ ai beaucoup aimé les plats camerounais et le service est hyper rapide et satisfaisant . je recommande fortement
text.en: very good bakery and ice cream parlor, but no pastry shop. the tea room allows you to consume some on site with an overview of the central post office intersection.

text.fr: un très bon accueil , le petit déjeuner est très bon et les serveurs sont toujours très aimables et accueillants .
text.en: This review only concerns the bakery. firstly the quality is disappointing, the coup of the best baker in France is only a commercial scam, the quality is not even at the level of industrial bakeries such as Paul. the same goes for pastries even though they don't go with the back of the spoon when it comes to prices (1000f for a pain au chocolat). but the worst comes from the service with desperately slow and unpleasant waitresses, they never have change and don't care about the customer. hard to swallow when you pay prices worthy of an excellent Parisian bakery!

text.fr: très bel accueil par solange convivialité au restaurant très bon plat africain et asiatique star parfait vraiment un seul mot merci
text.en: above this French bakery a nice restaurant serving snacks (croque monsieur salad) or dishes or pizzas. Generous and good pizzas. salads giving gastric problems the next morning. . . very good ice cream. a gracious and efficient service even if sometimes a little slow. to do with family without worries

text.fr: accueil super service irréprochable bonne enbiance pointée d une bonne musique pour tout couronner d un bon repas merci encore
text.en: very good address for fresh fruit juices pressed on site and before your eyes. you make your fruit selection yourself. On the other hand, the products from the bakery/pastry section are rather expensive, for a very average taste quality.

text.fr: le resto tres conviviale . le personnel accueillant gentil et souriant . merci a larissa et marie louise .
text.en: a desire for a “complete” pancake on the bakery floor, calm and pleasant atmosphere, alone or in a group

text.fr: super bien servi accueil tres chaleureux plats très bien fais je dirais excellent encore merci aux staff en particulier larissa , adeline , marcel , dominique , emmanuel , gilles etc . . .
text.en: so I was there with a friend who I adore! already the setting is perfect for chatting. you know that little French thing with paintings everywhere we were well received by pretty and kind waitresses. Their burgers were great and I was full. we had ice cream and believe me I didn't regret anything. I almost forgot the music was superb basically great for eating.

text.fr: bonne accueil , très bon buffet très bon service bref excellent de meilleur met traditionnelle le safoutier c ' est juste excellent
text.en: located in the center of the city. average restaurant. a little narrow. good meal . a little expensive for its quality. can do better
